SYSTEM: 03_RDF%28S%29_APIS_and_SPARQL_%28complete%29.pdf: Página 44
© O. Corcho, R.García-Castro, O. Muñoz-García
47
RDF and RDF Schema
Restricting values
@prefix dc:   <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/> .
@prefix :     <http://example.org/book/> .
@prefix ns:   <http://example.org/ns#> .
:book1  dc:title  "SPARQL Tutorial" .
:book1  ns:price  42 .
:book2  dc:title  "The Semantic Web" .
:book2  ns:price  23 .
PREFIX  dc:  <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/>
SELECT  ?title
WHERE   { ?x dc:title ?title
FILTER regex(?title, "^SPARQL") 
}
title
"SPARQL Tutorial"
PREFIX  dc:  <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/>
SELECT  ?title
WHERE   { ?x dc:title ?title
FILTER regex(?title, "web", "i" ) 
}
title
"The Semantic Web"
PREFIX  dc:  <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/>
PREFIX  ns:  <http://example.org/ns#>
SELECT  ?title ?price
WHERE   { ?x ns:price ?price .
FILTER (?price < 30.5)
?x dc:title ?title . }
title
price
"The Semantic Web"
23
speaker: SYSTEM
